definition: of something having the color of jade, an old or over-worked horse, exhaust or get tired through overuse or great strain or stress
details:
adjective
- of something having the color of jade
noun
- an old or over-worked horse
= synonyms: hack, nag, plug
- a light green color varying from bluish green to yellowish green
- a woman adulterer
= synonyms: adulteress, fornicatress, hussy, loose woman, slut, strumpet, trollop
- a semiprecious gemstone that takes a high polish
= synonyms: jadestone
verb
- exhaust or get tired through overuse or great strain or stress
= synonyms: fatigue
- lose interest or become bored with something or somebody
= synonyms: fatigue
